name: Pill Pong
description:
TIME TO TAKE SOME PILLS!

A puzzle game about planning, chain reactions and pills that will always have an effect on you (you're just a red ball). Assign one of your many side effects at your disposal to each pill in the level, and then playtest to see if you've created a valid side effect chain! The pill with the flag must be the last one to be collected.

MY FIRST EVER GAME JAM!

Made in 8 days for a Game Jam held by an association at my university, it doesn't have many levels, but they're carefully made so there's always an answer that's challenging, yet fun to find. It won't be as easy as you might expect, so good luck if you want to beat the whole thing!
